name: Ball, Bounce!
description:
Drag the mouse to move the ball, go into the hole to win!

To explain better:

1.You don't have to drag from the ball, drag anywhere on the screen

2.The ball will follow the direction of the drag. Example: drag the mouse upward on the right of the screen. The ball will be thrown upward, wherever it is. Another Example: The ball is in the air. Drag the mouse left anywhere on the screen, the ball will be thrown left

2.Control speed by dragging the mouse faster/slower

In the last level, if you finish it will teleport you back at the beginning of the level
